0.item_description:
My pencil.
I'm not much of a school person, but it's fun to drum wit

1.item_description:
My water bottle.
Sometimes I forget it at recess.

2.item_description:
My notebook.
I'm supposed to write stuff down, but I mostly use it for doodles.

3.item_description:
My lunchbox.
I wonder what salad I got today. I hope it's the one with salami.

4.item_description:
It's stuffy, the best stuffed animal of all time.
Molly's best friend in the whole world.

5.item_description:
A can of food.
Consumed at the end of the day to give you +1 food. If you don't have +1 food at the end of the day, you will starve.

6.item_description:
A bottle of water.
Consumed at the end of the day to give you +1 water. If you don't have +2 water at the end of the day, you will starve.

7.item_description:
A baseball bat.
A sturdy weapon with some reach. Hopefully I won't have to use it, but you never know...

8.item_description:
A walkie talkie.
The range on these babies is massive.\nI'll need this if I want to be able to communicate with people long distances.

9.item_description:
A meat cleaver.
Not the cleanest weapon, but it will get the job done in a pinch.

10.item_description:
A map of the toown and surrounding area.
I've marked the evacuation areas.It's pretty much a straight shot to Molly, but this will be helpful if I get lost.

11.item_description:
A jug of water.
Consumed at the end of the day to give you +2 water. If you don't have +2 water at the end of the day, you will starve.

12.item_description:
A sleeping bag.
There hasn't been a weather forcast on the news since the emergency messages started.
